trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class defines the recipient of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
Constructs an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class.
An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the recipient certificate.

The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> constructor constructs an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class by using the specified recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> 생성자는 지정된 수신자 인증서를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 생성합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient> class has the following default property values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient> 클래스 기본 속성 값은 다음과 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: null 참조를 유효한 인수로 사용하지 않는 메서드에 null 참조가 전달된 경우

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: 암호화 작업을 완료할 수 없는 경우

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: 수신자의 식별자 형식을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> 열거형의 멤버입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that represents the recipient certificate.

The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> constructor constructs an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> class by using the specified recipient identifier type and recipient certificate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)" /> 생성자는 지정된 수신자 식별자 형식과 수신자 인증서를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 생성합니다.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: null 참조를 유효한 인수로 사용하지 않는 메서드에 null 참조가 전달된 경우

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: 암호화 작업을 완료할 수 없는 경우

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.Certificate" /> property retrieves the certificate associated with the recipient.
An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> object that holds the certificate associated with the recipient.
The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsRecipient.RecipientIdentifierType" /> property retrieves the type of the identifier of the recipient.
A member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration that specifies the type of the identifier of the recipient.
trans-unit.target: 수신자의 식별자 형식을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> 열거형의 멤버입니다.
